features.name: HubSpot Form Configuration
features.description: Configure HubSpot Portal ID and Form ID to connect and embed HubSpot forms into DNN pages.
test_scenarios: Enter valid Portal ID and Form ID
Enter invalid Portal ID and verify error message
Enter invalid Form ID and verify error message
Leave Portal ID empty and verify required field validation
Leave Form ID empty and verify required field validation
Save settings and verify they persist
Cancel settings without saving and verify no changes

features.name: HubSpot Credentials Validation
features.description: Validates HubSpot Portal ID and Form ID against HubSpot API to ensure they exist and are accessible.
test_scenarios: Validate correct Portal ID and Form ID combination
Validate incorrect Portal ID shows 'Portal Id or Form Id is invalid' error
Validate incorrect Form ID shows 'Portal Id or Form Id is invalid' error
Test validation timeout handling
Test validation when HubSpot API is unavailable

features.name: HubSpot Form Display
features.description: Renders embedded HubSpot forms on DNN pages using JavaScript integration.
features.ui_location: Any page where HubSpot Forms module is added
test_scenarios: Display form when valid configuration exists
Show initialization message when Portal ID is not configured
Verify form loads from HubSpot JavaScript API
Test form rendering in different browsers
Verify form placeholder is created with correct ID
Test error handling when HubSpot script fails to load

features.name: Form Submission Completion Actions
features.description: Configure different actions to occur after successful form submission including redirect, custom message, or default behavior.
test_scenarios: Select 'HubSpot's Default Action' and verify form uses HubSpot's configured follow-up
Select 'No Action' and verify form hides after submission
Select 'Redirect To Url' and verify redirect URL field appears
Select 'Custom Message' and verify rich text editor appears
Change completion action and verify UI updates dynamically

features.name: Post-Submission Redirect
features.description: Redirect users to a specific URL after successful form submission.
features.ui_location: Module Settings > Completion Action > Redirect To Url
test_scenarios: Configure redirect to internal page using page picker
Configure redirect to external URL
Configure redirect using Tab ID (numeric value)
Submit form and verify redirect occurs
Test redirect with invalid URL
Verify redirect URL is properly encoded

features.name: Post-Submission Custom Message
features.description: Display a custom HTML message after successful form submission instead of default behavior.
features.ui_location: Module Settings > Completion Action > Custom Message
test_scenarios: Enter plain text custom message
Enter HTML formatted custom message
Test special characters and HTML encoding
Verify message displays after form submission
Test empty custom message handling
Verify rich text editor functionality
Test multi-line message with line breaks

features.name: Module Initialization Check
features.description: Displays warning message when module is not properly configured with HubSpot credentials.
features.ui_location: Any page where unconfigured HubSpot Forms module is added
test_scenarios: Add module without configuration and verify initialization message
Configure Portal ID and verify message disappears
Remove Portal ID and verify message reappears
Verify message styling (dnnFormMessage dnnFormWarning)

features.name: Module Localization
features.description: Support for multiple languages through resource files for all user-facing text.
test_scenarios: Verify all labels display correctly from resource files
Test error messages localization
Verify dropdown option text localization
Test default 'Thank You' message localization
Verify help text displays for form fields

features.name: Settings Persistence
features.description: Save and retrieve module settings including HubSpot configuration and submission behavior.
test_scenarios: Save all settings and verify persistence after page reload
Update individual settings and verify only changed values update
Test settings with special characters
Verify settings are module-specific (not shared between instances)
Test NoRedirectOnUpdate query parameter functionality

features.name: JavaScript Error Handling
features.description: Handles JavaScript errors during form loading and displays error messages to users.
test_scenarios: Test form loading with invalid HubSpot credentials
Test behavior when HubSpot JavaScript fails to load
Verify console.error messages are captured and displayed
Test error display in form placeholder
Verify error handling doesn't break page functionality
